mapper.select: SELECT tmp.introductionId id, GROUP_CONCAT(tmp.bzr) headTeacher, GROUP_CONCAT(tmp.fubzr) viceTeacher, tmp.send_word sendWord, tmp.class_backbone classBackbone, tmp.class_introduction classIntroduction, tmp.picUrl, tmp.picName, tmp.thumbnailUrl, tmp.videoName, tmp.videoUrl, tmp.videoId , tmp.pictureId FROM (SELECT CASE type WHEN 1 THEN GROUP_CONCAT(ut.name) END bzr, CASE type WHEN 2 THEN GROUP_CONCAT(ut.name) END fubzr, rtc.type, tcci.id introductionId, tcci.send_word, tcci.class_backbone, tcci.class_introduction, tccp.pic_url picUrl, tccp.pic_name picName, tccp.thumbnail_url thumbnailUrl, tccv.video_name videoName, tccv.transform_url videoUrl, tcci.video_id videoId, tcci.picture_id pictureId FROM teach_class_card_introduction tcci LEFT JOIN ref_teacher_class rtc ON tcci.class_id = rtc.class_id LEFT JOIN user_teacher ut ON ut.id = rtc.teacher_id LEFT JOIN teach_class_card_picture tccp ON tccp.id = tcci.picture_id LEFT JOIN teach_class_card_video tccv on tccv.id =tcci.video_id WHERE tcci.class_card_id = #{classCardId} AND tcci.del_flag = 0 AND ut.del_flag = 0 AND rtc.cycle_id = (SELECT id FROM teach_cycle where school_id=#{schoolId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY tcci.id , rtc.type) tmp GROUP BY tmp.introductionId
